name: Team 24 - Crack Pipe
description:
PITCH

Crack Pipe is a 2D platformer game. You incarnate Ben the dog who goes to a party with his friends in the forest. When he wakes up the next morning, he finds himself all alone. He has only one goal, to find his sweet chair. With his famous pipe and the various plants, will he be able to  find his way to his home?

CONTEXT

Crack Pipe  was made during a Game Jam by 8 people. Our team  had to make a game related to the retro Game Boy consols and the word "tuyau" in french that we transform it into "pipe" in english.

CREDITS

Programming

Thomas Takagi - Elvis Henry - Aymeric Mougeot

Game Design

Nicolas Coulliais - Julien Barlet

Art

Gabriel Kenig - Emilie Boun Nhang

Producing
